{"t1":"Disbursement Information", "t2":"Disbursement Preference: Account deposit is only available for Popular accounts", "t3":"Account Holder Name", "t4":"Account Number", "t5":"Popular Document where heirs authorized to disburse in the account", "t6":"Upload Document", "t7":"Pick the branch town you wish to pick-up check:", "t8":"Pick the branch you wish to pick-up check:", "t9":"Select Branch", "t10":"Will all heirs be present when the picking-up the check?", "t11":"Where is located the heir that cant be present at the moment of picking-up the check? (Select all that apply)", "t12":"Affidavit or Power of Attorney issued in Puerto Rico authorizing a third party to receive, endorse and/or exchange check because of the transaction", "t13":"Affidavit or Power of Attorney issued in United States and a Country Clerk Certificate from issuance state"}

{"t1":"Apostille (note or explanatory letter) from the issuance country", "t2":"Military Power", "t3":"Is the sum of all account balances at the death date was greater than $15K?", "t4":"If the disbursement amount is greater than $15,000 upon death, a Certificate of Release of Tax Lien will be required.", "t5":"If the balance at the date of death is greater than $15K, a Certificate of Release of Tax Lien with the Estate Tax Return will be required and will need submit a new request. We recommend that you request a certification of bank relationship. Click", "t6":"here", "t7":"to learn how to request certification.", "t8":"Select Yes/No/Dont know", "t9":"Yes", "t11":"Dont know", "t12":"Select Disbursement preference", "t13":"Account deposit", "t14":"Pick-up at branch", "t15":"Select Yes/No", "t16":"Active Duty in US Armed Forces", "t17":"United States"}
{"t1":"I have read and accept the legal notification above.", "t2":"Submit"}

{"t1":"We are sorry for your loss, and we are here to support you during this difficult time.", "t2":"What is your request?", "t3":"Continue", "t4":"Continue", "t5":"Select request type", "t6":"Advance Funds For Unpaid Funeral Expenses", "t7":"General Advance Of Available Funds Or Certification Of Bank", "t8":"Liquidation of Funds", "t9":"Please verify the documents required below.", "t10":"By clicking continue you will be redirected to another page.", "t11":"This Request Type is not available at this time."}
